lines.text: Just to be sure... this wasn't your fault, was it, Leo?
What? Kid, what are you on about?
Police brutality, man! How do I know you didn't kill this guy and then set him up like something here did it?
Cripes, Seeker. Give me a break.
You think I don't know the cops are corrupt? You guys are a bunch of fascist-
Yeah, yeah, yeah. I've heard it a million times, kid.
I'm not gonna claim things don't get ugly in this job, but you know as well as I do that the city'd be a smoking crater without us.
Don't give me that! How do you know the people wouldn't self-police without the pigs in the picture?
You want me to crack open a history textbook? They didn't.
Sure. Maybe you legalize magic and you get a nice happy wizard paradise.
And then the first time some angry highschooler summons an apocalypse demon, it all burns to the ground.
...That doesn't justify the things you do!
I think that's exactly what justifies what we do.
It justifies killing people and framing someone else for the crime?
What? No. It doesn't, and we didn't do that.
...Fine, but I've got my eye on you.
